description: Numerators of continued fraction convergents to sqrt(444).
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,590,0,-1).
mathematica: Numerator[Convergents[Sqrt[444], 20]] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Oct 01 2013 *)CoefficientList[Series[-(x^3 - 21 x^2 - 295 x - 21)/(x^4 - 590 x^2 + 1), {x, 0, 25}], x] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 10 2013 *)
prog: (MAGMA) I:=[21,295,12411,174049]; [n le 4 select I[n] else 590*Self(n-2)-Self(n-4): n in [1..20]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 10 2013
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
